scripts.copy-dev: mkdir -p static/scripts/vendor && cp node_modules/htmx.org/dist/htmx.js static/scripts/vendor/htmx.js && cp node_modules/hyperscript.org/dist/_hyperscript.js static/hyperscript.js
scripts.copy: mkdir -p static/scripts/vendor && cp node_modules/htmx.org/dist/htmx.min.js static/scripts/vendor/htmx.js && cp node_modules/hyperscript.org/dist/_hyperscript.min.js static/hyperscript.js
